description:
As the world becomes more urban, most businesses will be concentrated in cities. Urban centers will be hubs of challenges but also of opportunities, namely, for companies. Whether working as playgrounds, as connectors or even as clients, cities can be facilitators for growth. But how? 
AGENDA 
09.00am – 09.30am	Check-in & Networking
09.30am – 09.40am	Opening
09.40am – 10.20am	The city as a hub of opportunities
10.20am – 11.00am	How can cities promote a framework to scaleup innovative businesses across Europe
11.00am – 11.40am	Doing Business – Why corporates, cities and startups need to collaborate
11.40am – 12.00am	Coffee-break & Networking
12.00am – 12.40am	Facilitating procurement across borders towards a digital single market
12.40am – 12.55am	Keynote
12.55am – 01.00pm	Closing Session
01.00pm – 02.30pm	Lunch
name: Scaleup For Europe Conference - There’s a market in cities
